Body: Possible Duplicate:  What can I do to manage my phone's internal storage?  I have the  HTC Status, and love it!  But lately I'm getting "Internal memory low" messages when I try to open or download something in my messages.   It tells me to go to the "settings" tab and make space.  I don't have many Apps on it, the biggest I believe is the FB App-but it's the so called "FB Phone" so why am I still having issues?  I uninstall and delete data and try to move things to the sd-card and empty inboxes all the time and it just moves a few MB and leaves me alone.  It gets bad sometimes, where it won't let me even ope and read a text even if there aren't any pics to load.  Any help would be greatly appreciated!
Title: HTC STATUS-INTERNAL MEMORY LOW EVEN WITH SD-CARD?

history.Text: I have the  HTC Status, and love it!  But lately I'm getting "Internal memory low" messages when I try to open or download something in my messages.   It tells me to go to the "settings" tab and make space.  I don't have many Apps on it, the biggest I believe is the FB App-but it's the so called "FB Phone" so why am I still having issues?  I uninstall and delete data and try to move things to the sd-card and empty inboxes all the time and it just moves a few MB and leaves me alone.  It gets bad sometimes, where it won't let me even ope and read a text even if there aren't any pics to load.  Any help would be greatly appreciated!
HTC STATUS-INTERNAL MEMORY LOW EVEN WITH SD-CARD?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [What can I do to manage my phone's internal storage?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/2065/what-can-i-do-to-manage-my-phones-internal-storage)  I have the  HTC Status, and love it!  But lately I'm getting "Internal memory low" messages when I try to open or download something in my messages.   It tells me to go to the "settings" tab and make space.  I don't have many Apps on it, the biggest I believe is the FB App-but it's the so called "FB Phone" so why am I still having issues?  I uninstall and delete data and try to move things to the sd-card and empty inboxes all the time and it just moves a few MB and leaves me alone.  It gets bad sometimes, where it won't let me even ope and read a text even if there aren't any pics to load.  Any help would be greatly appreciated!
